ai_description: The description is presented in a television commercial voice: Doctor Ratchetâ€™s Automaton Build-It Kit! This kit contains enough items to create over fifteen automatons! Fun for the whole family! From personal servants to flame-throwing sentinel droids, this kit has a little of everything. The only limit is your imagination. And your insurance policy.
description: Doctor Ratchet's Automaton Build-It Kit is a large, steampunk-y chest hissing with clockwork gears. It contains dozens of automaton parts.
name: Doctor Ratchet's Automaton Build-It Kit
rules_text: Crafting kit that provides crafting supplies for building automatons.
